sentence: Representative Madison Cawthorn was briefly detained by the police on Tuesday after trying to bring a loaded gun through airport security in Charlotte, N.C., in his carry-on bag, the second time in a little more than a year that the North Carolina Republican has been stopped from flying with a firearm.
title: Madison Cawthorn Again Brought a Loaded Gun to the Airport, Officials Say

sentence: This is the second time a gun has been found on Cawthorn at an airport: The Transportation Security Administration discovered a 9mm handgun in his carry-on bag at Asheville Regional Airport in February 2021. Virtually every Monday or Tuesday we start the week out with another embarrassing headline from Madison Cawthorn .
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Madison Cawthorn Cited For Carrying Gun At Charlotte Airport

author: Ryan Bort
title: Madison Cawthorn Caught Trying to Bring a Gun Through Airport Security  Again

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., was cited for being in possession of a firearm at Charlotte Douglas International Airport on Tuesday morning, according to multiple local media reports.
author: Paul Best
title: North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having gun at Charlotte airport: reports

sentence: Officers cited Rep. Madison Cawthorn on Tuesday for carrying a loaded gun inside of Charlotte Douglas International Airport, the latest in a string of controversies Cawthorn has found himself in.
author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: Madison Cawthorn is cited for bringing a loaded gun into the Charlotte Airport

sentence: Representative Madison Cawthorn (R., N.C.) was stopped by police on Tuesday after trying to bring a loaded handgun on board a flight.
author: Arjun Singh
title: Madison Cawthorn Stopped by Police from Taking Gun on Flight

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn is favored to win the Republican primary in North Carolina's 11th Congressional District despite several run-ins with the law and fresh allegations of insider trading.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn holds GOP primary edge despite many unflattering headlines
